body.p: Materiality judgements about cumulative errors in prior‑period financial statements that an entity made at the time those statements were authorised for issue need not be revisited in subsequent periods unless the entity failed to use, or misused, information that:

li.p: was available when financial statements for those periods were authorised for issue; and
could reasonably be expected to have been obtained and taken into account in the preparation of those financial statements.
